name: part_004
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕LIVE2023】3rd Generation Girls Band !!!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [AqEqeiqskEI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of the song 'Pretender'.
Performance of the song 'Tenshi ni Fureta yo!'.

subtitles.original: ...で 出会える世界線
subtitles.english: ...in a worldline where we meet.

subtitles.original: 選べたらよかった もっと違う性格で
subtitles.english: I wish I could've chosen it, with a different personality.

subtitles.original: もっと違う価値観で
subtitles.english: With a different set of values.

subtitles.original: 愛を伝えられたらいいな
subtitles.english: I wish I could've expressed my love.

subtitles.original: そう願っても無駄だから
subtitles.english: But even if I wish for that, it's futile.

subtitles.original: Goodbye 君の運命の人は僕じゃない
subtitles.english: Goodbye, the one destined for you isn't me.

subtitles.original: 辛いけど否めない でも離れ難いのさ
subtitles.english: It's painful but undeniable, yet it's hard to let go.

subtitles.original: その髪に触れただけで 痛いや いやいや
subtitles.english: Just touching your hair, it hurts, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: でも甘いな いやいや Goodbye
subtitles.english: But it's sweet, no, no, goodbye.

subtitles.original: それじゃ僕にとって君は何？
subtitles.english: Then, what are you to me?

subtitles.original: 答えは分からない 分かりたくもないのさ
subtitles.english: I don't know the answer, and I don't want to know.

subtitles.original: たった一つ確かなことが あるとするのならば
subtitles.english: If there's only one thing for certain,

subtitles.original: 君は綺麗だ
subtitles.english: You are beautiful.

subtitles.original: 誰かが偉そうに語る 恋愛の論理
subtitles.english: Some logic of love that someone talks about so pompously,

subtitles.original: 何一つとしてピンとこなくて
subtitles.english: None of it really clicks for me.

subtitles.original: 飛行機の窓から見下ろした
subtitles.english: It's like looking down from an airplane window

subtitles.original: 知らない街の夜景みたいだ
subtitles.english: At the night view of an unknown city.

subtitles.original: もっと違う設定で もっと違う関係で
subtitles.english: In a different setting, in a different relationship,

subtitles.original: 出会える世界線 選べたらよかった
subtitles.english: I wish I could've chosen a worldline where we met.

subtitles.original: いたって純な心で 叶った恋を抱きしめて
subtitles.english: With a very pure heart, holding onto a love that came true,

subtitles.original: 「好きだ」とか無責任に言えたらいいな
subtitles.english: I wish I could say "I love you" so irresponsibly.

subtitles.original: そう願っても虚しいのさ
subtitles.english: But even if I wish for that, it's hollow.

subtitles.original: Goodbye つないだ手の向こうに エンドライン
subtitles.english: Goodbye, an end-line beyond our joined hands.

subtitles.original: 引き伸ばすたびに 疼きだす未来には
subtitles.english: In the future that starts to ache every time I prolong it,

subtitles.original: 君はいない その事実に 痛いや いやいや
subtitles.english: You aren't there. Facing that fact, it hurts, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: それじゃ苦しいよな
subtitles.english: That would be painful, wouldn't it?

subtitles.original: Goodbye 君の運命の人は僕じゃない
subtitles.english: Goodbye, the one destined for you isn't me.

subtitles.original: 辛いけど否めない でも離れ難いのさ
subtitles.english: It's painful but undeniable, yet it's hard to let go.

subtitles.original: その髪に触れただけで 痛いや いやいや
subtitles.english: Just touching your hair, it hurts, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: 子でも甘いな いやいや Goodbye
subtitles.english: But it's sweet, no, no, goodbye.

subtitles.original: それじゃ僕にとって君は何？
subtitles.english: Then, what are you to me?

subtitles.original: 答えは分からない 分かりたくもないのさ
subtitles.english: I don't know the answer, and I don't want to know.

subtitles.original: たった一つ確かなことが あるとするのならば
subtitles.english: If there's only one thing for certain,

subtitles.original: 君は綺麗だ
subtitles.english: You are beautiful.

subtitles.original: それも分かってるんだ
subtitles.english: I know that too.

subtitles.original: とても綺麗だ
subtitles.english: You are very beautiful.

subtitles.original:
天使にふれたよ！
作詞：稲葉エミ 作曲：川口進
subtitles.english:
Tenshi ni Fureta yo! (We touched an Angel!)
Lyrics: Emi Inaba Composition: Susumu Kawaguchi

subtitles.original: ねえ 思い出の欠片に
subtitles.english: Hey, if I were to name...

subtitles.original: 名前をつけて保存するなら
subtitles.english: ...the fragments of our memories and save them...

subtitles.original: 「宝物」がぴったりだね
subtitles.english: ..."Treasure" would be the perfect name.

subtitles.original: そう 心の容量が
subtitles.english: Yeah, we spent so much time together...

subtitles.original: いっぱいになるくらいに過ごしたね
subtitles.english: ...that my heart's capacity is almost full.

subtitles.original: ときめき色の毎日
subtitles.english: Every day was colored with excitement.

subtitles.original: なじんだ制服と上履き
subtitles.english: Our familiar uniforms and indoor shoes.
